A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson and all of the cast have created a movie that is truly worthy being called one of the greatest Star Wars movies of all time to come!! It's fun\, emotional\, funny\, unpredictable and just down right amazing!!! People will certainly feel this is one the great ways to end the year. After seeing that movie I have huge trust and faith in Johnson's new future Trilogy as well as really looking forward to Episode 9! I won't spoil\, I'll just tell you this movie is really \"not going to go\, the way you thing\" ;)
